item.title: Pathtracer Devlog
item.description: This post is a devlog for my pathtracer-playground project. Follow along to see the progress, starting from scratch by opening a simple window. GpuBuffer 2023-11-01 Commit: 0a826c4 Not a lot of visible progress, but GpuBuffer was introduced (in gpu_buffer.hpp) to significantly reduce the amount of boilerplate due to buffers & bind group descriptors: Showing 5 changed files with 254 additions and 275 deletions. On another note, used immediately invoked lambda functions for the first time today:
